name: Christmas Rolling Balls
description:
Christmas Rolling Balls : Winter Edition Is addictive Game Which have up to 5 different characters and reach higher score on Rolling Balls : Winter Edition .

Just tap to jump and beware from enemy object and collect the gems. Create your best score.

There are 45+ Random generate level make it more challenging. Play this game and challenge your friends.

Share your score and challenge your friends. It's amazing addictive game for adventure and entertainment.

Features:
=======
- Free Game.
- 45+ Levels.
- There are 5 different characters.
- Endless Game.

So why you think? It's Free Game. Play and Enjoy...
